abbot.editor
Class ScriptEditorFrame

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Frame
                  javax.swing.JFrame
                      abbot.editor.ScriptEditorFrame
All Implemented Interfaces:
EditorConstants, Version, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class ScriptEditorFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements EditorConstants, Version

Provides the primary frame for the Costello script editor. Maintains the LAF used when first created, restoring it temporarily when displaying any new components. FIXME needs major refactoring: Export actions (via ActionMap) Use generic menu setup provided by a special array of actions

Author:
Kyle Girard, twall
See Also:
Serialized Form
